name: Study
text: Study is very important for better future. If you read daily, then you can get a good result in the examination.

name: Sleep
text: Sleep is important for a human. If you want to increase your activity then you have to sleep 8 hours daily.

name: Coding
text: Coding is a very interesting field. If you can build your logic, then you will feel awesome with coding. It will become a part of your life.

name: Prayer
text: I am a muslim. I have to pray for five times in the mosque. It is mandatory for me. If you pray five times, then you will feel a peace in your heart.

name: Outdoor game
text: Outdoor game is important for our health. If you play outside in the afternoon, then your mind will be fresh and your body will be fit.

name: Exercise
text: Exercise is very important for a healthy health. You can do exercise in the morning or in the evening. You can run or anything as you wish.
